alert.note: Alert for Eastern Lemhi County; Western Lemhi County (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 4:47PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Lemhi County through 515 PM MDT... At 447 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over North Fork, or 14 miles north of Salmon, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... North Fork. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Lemhi County; Western Lemhi County
